conclusion: Identify known information about the semicylinder, ball, angle, and constants.
Determine coordinates of points O, A, and C using the angle and radius.
Determine the y-coordinate of point B using the trajectory and grazing condition.
Set up parametric equations for the ball's position at time t.
Use the grazing condition to relate velocity components and solve for v_0.
Calculate the initial velocity v_0 using the tangent condition.
Calculate the time taken for the ball to move from B to C using v_0.
Determine the final answer for the time taken.
